title: Honeyed Parsnips
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F. Bring a large saucepan of water to the boil. Reduce the heat, add the parsnips, and cook for 5 minutes. Drain thoroughly.

2. Pour 2 tablespoons of the vegetable oil into a shallow casserole dish and add the parsnips. Mix the remaining oil with the honey and drizzle over the parsnips. Roast in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, until golden brown and tender. Remove from the oven and serve.
